verses.verse: Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> might be <S%H3615>fulfilled,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> that he made a <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and put it <S%H1571>also<s%> in <S%H4385>writing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H6485>charged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is there among you of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H5971>people?<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and let him go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1931>(he<s%> is the <S%H430>God,)<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> in <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1481>sojourneth,<s%> let the <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5375>help<s%> him with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and with <S%H929>beasts,<s%> <S%H5973>beside<s%> the freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then rose <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5782>raised,<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> they that were <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> with <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and with <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and with precious <S%H4030>things,<s%> beside <S%H905>all<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that was willingly <S%H5068>offered.<s%>

Also <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3389><s%> and had <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>gods;<s%>

Even those did <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4990>Mithredath<s%> the <S%H1489>treasurer,<s%> and <S%H5608>numbered<s%> them unto <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And <S%H428>this<s%> is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H105>chargers<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H105>chargers<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H4252>knives,<s%>

Thirty <S%H7970><s%> <S%H3713>basins<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3713>basins<s%> of a <S%H4932>second<s%> sort <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten,<s%> and <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> a <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> these did <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar<s%> bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> that were brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>Babylon<s%> <S%H894><s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
